mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_EQUIP_TEMPATUR_COND_ADM( EQUIP_COND_SEQ, WARMUP_COND, WARMUP_ALWNCE_PLUS, WARMUP_ALWNCE_MINUS, FITUP1_UP_COND, FITUP1_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS, FITUP1_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS, FITUP1_DOWN_COND, FITUP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS, FITUP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS, FITUP2_UPLEFT_COND, FITUP2_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FITUP2_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, FITUP2_DOWNLEFT_COND, FITUP2_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FITUP2_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, FITUP2_UPRIGHT_COND, FITUP2_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FITUP2_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS, FITUP2_DOWNRIGHT_COND, FITUP2_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FITUP2_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS, ROLLHEAT_UP_COND, ROLLHEAT_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS, ROLLHEAT_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS, ROLLHEAT_DOWN_COND, ROLLHEAT_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS, ROLLHEAT_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS, FIRST_UPLEFT_COND, FIRST_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FIRST_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, FIRST_DOWNLEFT_COND, FIRST_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FIRST_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, FIRST_UPRIGHT_COND, FIRST_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FIRST_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS, FIRST_DOWNRIGHT_COND, FIRST_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, FIRST_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS,
PUSH1_UP_COND, PUSH1_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS, PUSH1_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS, PUSH1_DOWN_COND, PUSH1_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS, PUSH1_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS,
SECOND_UPLEFT_COND, SECOND_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, SECOND_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, SECOND_DOWNLEFT_COND, SECOND_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, SECOND_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, SECOND_UPRIGHT_COND, SECOND_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, SECOND_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS, SECOND_DOWNRIGHT_COND, SECOND_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, SECOND_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS, THIRD_UPLEFT_COND, THIRD_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, THIRD_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, THIRD_DOWNLEFT_COND, THIRD_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS, THIRD_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS, THIRD_UPRIGHT_COND, THIRD_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, THIRD_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS, THIRD_DOWNRIGHT_COND, THIRD_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS, THIRD_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS, JINJEOP1_UP_COND, JINJEOP1_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS, JINJEOP1_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS, JINJEOP1_DOWN_COND, JINJEOP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS, JINJEOP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS, JINJEOP2_UP_COND, JINJEOP2_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS, JINJEOP2_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS, JINJEOP2_DOWN_COND, JINJEOP2_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS, JINJEOP2_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS, REG_ID, REG_DATE ) VALUES( #{equipCondSeq}, #{warmupCond}, #{warmupAlwncePlus}, #{warmupAlwnceMinus}, #{fitup1UpCond}, #{fitup1UpAlwncePlus}, #{fitup1UpAlwnceMinus}, #{fitup1DownCond}, #{fitup1DownAlwncePlus}, #{fitup1DownAlwnceMinus}, #{fitup2UpleftCond}, #{fitup2UpleftAlwncePlus}, #{fitup2UpleftAlwnceMinus}, #{fitup2DownleftCond}, #{fitup2DownleftAlwncePlus}, #{fitup2DownleftAlwnceMinus}, #{fitup2UprightCond}, #{fitup2UprightAlwncePlus}, #{fitup2UprightAlwnceMinus}, #{fitup2DownrightCond}, #{fitup2DownrightAlwncePlus}, #{fitup2DownrightAlwnceMinus}, #{rollheatUpCond}, #{rollheatUpAlwncePlus}, #{rollheatUpAlwnceMinus}, #{rollheatDownCond}, #{rollheatDownAlwncePlus}, #{rollheatDownAlwnceMinus}, #{firstUpleftCond}, #{firstUpleftAlwncePlus}, #{firstUpleftAlwnceMinus}, #{firstDownleftCond}, #{firstDownleftAlwncePlus}, #{firstDownleftAlwnceMinus}, #{firstUprightCond}, #{firstUprightAlwncePlus}, #{firstUprightAlwnceMinus}, #{firstDownrightCond}, #{firstDownrightAlwncePlus}, #{firstDownrightAlwnceMinus},
#{push1UpCond}, #{push1UpAlwncePlus}, #{push1UpAlwnceMinus}, #{push1DownCond}, #{push1DownAlwncePlus}, #{push1DownAlwnceMinus},
#{secondUpleftCond}, #{secondUpleftAlwncePlus}, #{secondUpleftAlwnceMinus}, #{secondDownleftCond}, #{secondDownleftAlwncePlus}, #{secondDownleftAlwnceMinus}, #{secondUprightCond}, #{secondUprightAlwncePlus}, #{secondUprightAlwnceMinus}, #{secondDownrightCond}, #{secondDownrightAlwncePlus}, #{secondDownrightAlwnceMinus}, #{thirdUpleftCond}, #{thirdUpleftAlwncePlus}, #{thirdUpleftAlwnceMinus}, #{thirdDownleftCond}, #{thirdDownleftAlwncePlus}, #{thirdDownleftAlwnceMinus}, #{thirdUprightCond}, #{thirdUprightAlwncePlus}, #{thirdUprightAlwnceMinus}, #{thirdDownrightCond}, #{thirdDownrightAlwncePlus}, #{thirdDownrightAlwnceMinus}, #{jinjeop1UpCond}, #{jinjeop1UpAlwncePlus}, #{jinjeop1UpAlwnceMinus}, #{jinjeop1DownCond}, #{jinjeop1DownAlwncePlus}, #{jinjeop1DownAlwnceMinus}, #{jinjeop2UpCond}, #{jinjeop2UpAlwncePlus}, #{jinjeop2UpAlwnceMinus}, #{jinjeop2DownCond}, #{jinjeop2DownAlwncePlus}, #{jinjeop2DownAlwnceMinus}, #{regId}, getDate() )
mapper.select: SELECT A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ , C.GOODS_NM , A.FITUP_COND , A.FITUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.FITUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.FITUP2_COND , A.FITUP2_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.FITUP2_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.FIRST_COND , A.FIRST_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.FIRST_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.SECOND_COND , A.SECOND_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.SECOND_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.THIRD_COND , A.THIRD_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.THIRD_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.JINJEOP_COND , A.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.JINJEOP2_COND , A.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PUSH1_COND , A.PUSH1_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PUSH1_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.REFORM_COND , A.REFORM_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.REFORM_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.COOL_COND , A.COOL_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.COOL_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DATE , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DATE FROM TB_EQUIP_TIME_COND_ADM A, TB_EQUIP_COND_COMMON_ADM B, TB_GOODS_CODE_ADM C WHERE 1=1 AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = B.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AND B.GOODS_CD = C.GOODS_CD AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}

SELECT A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ , C.GOODS_NM , A.FITUP_COND , A.FITUP_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.FITUP_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PUSH1_COND , A.PUSH1_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PUSH1_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.JINJEOP_COND , A.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.JINJEOP2_COND , A.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DATE , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DATE FROM TB_EQUIP_PRESSURE_COND_ADM A, TB_EQUIP_COND_COMMON_ADM B, TB_GOODS_CODE_ADM C WHERE 1=1 AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = B.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AND B.GOODS_CD = C.GOODS_CD AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}

SELECT A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ , C.GOODS_NM , A.WP_LEFT_COND , A.WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.WP_RIGHT_COND , A.WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PITCH_LEFT_COND , A.PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PITCH_RIGHT_COND , A.PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_WING_LEFT_COND , A.PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_WING_RIGHT_COND , A.PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_COND , A.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_COND , A.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.FILM_COND , A.FILM_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.FILM_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.METAL_DEPTH_COND , A.METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.METAL_THICKNESS_COND , A.METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.TH_CENTER_COND , A.TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.TH_EDGE_COND , A.TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_MINUS , ISNULL(A.GAP_OF_LAYER_COND, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_COND , ISNULL(A.GAP_OF_LAYER_PLUS, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_PLUS , ISNULL(A.GAP_OF_LAYER_MINUS, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_MINUS , A.BURR_COND , A.BURR_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.BURR_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.WP_CENTER_COND , A.WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_COND , A.PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.WP_DEVIATION_COND , A.WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.X1_X2_COND , A.X1_X2_COND_PLUS , A.X1_X2_COND_MINUS , A.TH_EDGE_RIGHT_COND , A.TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.BENDING_COND , A.BENDING_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.BENDING_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DATE , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DATE FROM TB_EQUIP_SIZE_COND_ADM A, TB_EQUIP_COND_COMMON_ADM B, TB_GOODS_CODE_ADM C WHERE 1=1 AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = B.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AND B.GOODS_CD = C.GOODS_CD AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}

SELECT A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AS equipCondSeq , A.WARMUP_COND AS A_warmupCond , A.WARMUP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_warmupAlwncePlus , A.WARMUP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_warmupAlwnceMinus , A.FITUP1_UP_COND AS A_fitup1UpCond , A.FITUP1_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_fitup1UpAlwncePlus , A.FITUP1_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_fitup1UpAlwnceMinus , A.FITUP1_DOWN_COND AS A_fitup1DownCond , A.FITUP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_fitup1DownAlwncePlus , A.FITUP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_fitup1DownAlwnceMinus , A.FITUP2_UPLEFT_COND AS A_fitup2UpleftCond , A.FITUP2_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_fitup2UpleftAlwncePlus , A.FITUP2_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_fitup2UpleftAlwnceMinus , A.FITUP2_DOWNLEFT_COND AS A_fitup2DownleftCond , A.FITUP2_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_fitup2DownleftAlwncePlus , A.FITUP2_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_fitup2DownleftAlwnceMinus , A.FITUP2_UPRIGHT_COND AS A_fitup2UprightCond , A.FITUP2_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_fitup2UprightAlwncePlus , A.FITUP2_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_fitup2UprightAlwnceMinus , A.FITUP2_DOWNRIGHT_COND AS A_fitup2DownrightCond , A.FITUP2_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_fitup2DownrightAlwncePlus , A.FITUP2_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_fitup2DownrightAlwnceMinus , A.ROLLHEAT_UP_COND AS A_rollheatUpCond , A.ROLLHEAT_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_rollheatUpAlwncePlus , A.ROLLHEAT_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_rollheatUpAlwnceMinus , A.ROLLHEAT_DOWN_COND AS A_rollheatDownCond , A.ROLLHEAT_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_rollheatDownAlwncePlus , A.ROLLHEAT_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_rollheatDownAlwnceMinus , A.FIRST_UPLEFT_COND AS A_firstUpleftCond , A.FIRST_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_firstUpleftAlwncePlus , A.FIRST_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_firstUpleftAlwnceMinus , A.FIRST_DOWNLEFT_COND AS A_firstDownleftCond , A.FIRST_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_firstDownleftAlwncePlus , A.FIRST_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_firstDownleftAlwnceMinus , A.FIRST_UPRIGHT_COND AS A_firstUprightCond , A.FIRST_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_firstUprightAlwncePlus , A.FIRST_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_firstUprightAlwnceMinus , A.FIRST_DOWNRIGHT_COND AS A_firstDownrightCond , A.FIRST_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_firstDownrightAlwncePlus , A.FIRST_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_firstDownrightAlwnceMinus , A.PUSH1_UP_COND AS A_push1UpCond , A.PUSH1_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_push1UpAlwncePlus , A.PUSH1_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_push1UpAlwnceMinus , A.PUSH1_DOWN_COND AS A_push1DownCond , A.PUSH1_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_push1DownAlwncePlus , A.PUSH1_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_push1DownAlwnceMinus , A.SECOND_UPLEFT_COND AS A_secondUpleftCond , A.SECOND_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_secondUpleftAlwncePlus , A.SECOND_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_secondUpleftAlwnceMinus , A.SECOND_DOWNLEFT_COND AS A_secondDownleftCond , A.SECOND_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_secondDownleftAlwncePlus , A.SECOND_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_secondDownleftAlwnceMinus , A.SECOND_UPRIGHT_COND AS A_secondUprightCond , A.SECOND_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_secondUprightAlwncePlus , A.SECOND_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_secondUprightAlwnceMinus , A.SECOND_DOWNRIGHT_COND AS A_secondDownrightCond , A.SECOND_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_secondDownrightAlwncePlus , A.SECOND_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_secondDownrightAlwnceMinus , A.THIRD_UPLEFT_COND AS A_thirdUpleftCond , A.THIRD_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_thirdUpleftAlwncePlus , A.THIRD_UPLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_thirdUpleftAlwnceMinus , A.THIRD_DOWNLEFT_COND AS A_thirdDownleftCond , A.THIRD_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_thirdDownleftAlwncePlus , A.THIRD_DOWNLEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_thirdDownleftAlwnceMinus , A.THIRD_UPRIGHT_COND AS A_thirdUprightCond , A.THIRD_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_thirdUprightAlwncePlus , A.THIRD_UPRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_thirdUprightAlwnceMinus , A.THIRD_DOWNRIGHT_COND AS A_thirdDownrightCond , A.THIRD_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_thirdDownrightAlwncePlus , A.THIRD_DOWNRIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_thirdDownrightAlwnceMinus , A.JINJEOP1_UP_COND AS A_jinjeop1UpCond , A.JINJEOP1_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_jinjeop1UpAlwncePlus , A.JINJEOP1_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_jinjeop1UpAlwnceMinus , A.JINJEOP1_DOWN_COND AS A_jinjeop1DownCond , A.JINJEOP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_jinjeop1DownAlwncePlus , A.JINJEOP1_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_jinjeop1DownAlwnceMinus , A.JINJEOP2_UP_COND AS A_jinjeop2UpCond , A.JINJEOP2_UP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_jinjeop2UpAlwncePlus , A.JINJEOP2_UP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_jinjeop2UpAlwnceMinus , A.JINJEOP2_DOWN_COND AS A_jinjeop2DownCond , A.JINJEOP2_DOWN_ALWNCE_PLUS AS A_jinjeop2DownAlwncePlus , A.JINJEOP2_DOWN_ALWNCE_MINUS AS A_jinjeop2DownAlwnceMinus
, B.WARMUP_COND AS B_warmupCond , B.WARMUP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_warmupAlwncePlus , B.WARMUP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_warmupAlwnceMinus , B.FITUP_COND AS B_fitupCond , B.FITUP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_fitupAlwncePlus , B.FITUP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_fitupAlwnceMinus , B.FITUP2_COND AS B_fitup2Cond , B.FITUP2_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_fitup2AlwncePlus , B.FITUP2_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_fitup2AlwnceMinus , B.FIRST_COND AS B_firstCond , B.FIRST_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_firstAlwncePlus , B.FIRST_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_firstAlwnceMinus , B.SECOND_COND AS B_secondCond , B.SECOND_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_secondAlwncePlus , B.SECOND_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_secondAlwnceMinus , B.THIRD_COND AS B_thirdCond , B.THIRD_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_thirdAlwncePlus , B.THIRD_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_thirdAlwnceMinus , B.JINJEOP_COND AS B_jinjeopCond , B.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_jinjeopAlwncePlus , B.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_jinjeopAlwnceMinus , B.JINJEOP2_COND AS B_jinjeop2Cond , B.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_jinjeop2AlwncePlus , B.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_jinjeop2AlwnceMinus , B.PUSH1_COND AS B_push1Cond , B.PUSH1_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_push1AlwncePlus , B.PUSH1_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_push1AlwnceMinus , B.REFORM_COND AS B_reformCond , B.REFORM_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_reformAlwncePlus , B.REFORM_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_reformAlwnceMinus , B.COOL_COND AS B_coolCond , B.COOL_ALWNCE_PLUS AS B_coolAlwncePlus , B.COOL_ALWNCE_MINUS AS B_coolAlwnceMinus
, C.WARMUP_COND AS C_warmupCond , C.WARMUP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_warmupAlwncePlus , C.WARMUP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_warmupAlwnceMinus , C.FITUP_COND AS C_fitupCond , C.FITUP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_fitupAlwncePlus , C.FITUP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_fitupAlwnceMinus , C.FIRST_COND AS C_firstCond , C.FIRST_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_firstAlwncePlus , C.FIRST_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_firstAlwnceMinus , C.PUSH1_COND AS C_push1Cond , C.PUSH1_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_push1AlwncePlus , C.PUSH1_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_push1AlwnceMinus , C.SECOND_COND AS C_secondCond , C.SECOND_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_secondAlwncePlus , C.SECOND_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_secondAlwnceMinus , C.JINJEOP_COND AS C_jinjeopCond , C.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_jinjeopAlwncePlus , C.JINJEOP_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_jinjeopAlwnceMinus , C.JINJEOP2_COND AS C_jinjeop2Cond , C.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_jinjeop2AlwncePlus , C.JINJEOP2_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_jinjeop2AlwnceMinus , C.REFORM_COND AS C_reformCond , C.REFORM_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_reformAlwncePlus , C.REFORM_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_reformAlwnceMinus , C.COOL_COND AS C_coolCond , C.COOL_ALWNCE_PLUS AS C_coolAlwncePlus , C.COOL_ALWNCE_MINUS AS C_coolAlwnceMinus
, D.WP_LEFT_COND AS D_wpLeftCond , D.WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_wpLeftAlwncePlus , D.WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_wpLeftAlwnceMinus , D.WP_RIGHT_COND AS D_wpRightCond , D.WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_wpRightAlwncePlus , D.WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_wpRightAlwnceMinus , D.PITCH_LEFT_COND AS D_pitchLeftCond , D.PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_pitchLeftAlwncePlus , D.PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_pitchLeftAlwnceMinus , D.PITCH_RIGHT_COND AS D_pitchRightCond , D.PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_pitchRightAlwncePlus , D.PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_pitchRightAlwnceMinus , D.PPF_WING_LEFT_COND AS D_ppfWingLeftCond , D.PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_ppfWingLeftAlwncePlus , D.PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_ppfWingLeftAlwnceMinus , D.PPF_WING_RIGHT_COND AS D_ppfWingRightCond , D.PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_ppfWingRightAlwncePlus , D.PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_ppfWingRightAlwnceMinus , D.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_COND AS D_ppfDepthLeftCond , D.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_ppfDepthLeftAlwncePlus , D.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_ppfDepthLeftAlwnceMinus , D.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_COND AS D_ppfDepthRightCond , D.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_ppfDepthRightAlwncePlus , D.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_ppfDepthRightAlwnceMinus , D.FILM_COND AS D_filmCond , D.FILM_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_filmAlwncePlus , D.FILM_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_filmAlwnceMinus , D.METAL_DEPTH_COND AS D_metalDepthCond , D.METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_metalDepthAlwncePlus , D.METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_metalDepthAlwnceMinus , D.METAL_THICKNESS_COND AS D_metalThicknessCond , D.METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_metalThicknessAlwncePlus , D.METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_metalThicknessAlwnceMinus , D.TH_CENTER_COND AS D_thCenterCond , D.TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_thCenterAlwncePlus , D.TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_thCenterAlwnceMinus , D.TH_EDGE_COND AS D_thEdgeCond , D.TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_thEdgeAlwncePlus , D.TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_thEdgeAlwnceMinus , D.BURR_COND AS D_burrCond , D.BURR_ALWNCE_PLUS AS D_burrAlwncePlus , D.BURR_ALWNCE_MINUS AS D_burrAlwnceMinus FROM TB_EQUIP_TEMPATUR_COND_ADM A, TB_EQUIP_TIME_COND_ADM B, TB_EQUIP_PRESSURE_COND_ADM C, TB_EQUIP_SIZE_COND_ADM D WHERE 1=1 AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = B.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AND B.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = C.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AND C.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = D.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}

SELECT A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ , C.GOODS_NM , A.WP_LEFT_COND , A.WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.WP_RIGHT_COND , A.WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PITCH_LEFT_COND , A.PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PITCH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PITCH_RIGHT_COND , A.PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PITCH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_WING_LEFT_COND , A.PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_WING_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_WING_RIGHT_COND , A.PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_WING_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_COND , A.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_LEFT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_COND , A.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.FILM_COND , A.FILM_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.FILM_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.METAL_DEPTH_COND , A.METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.METAL_DEPTH_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.METAL_THICKNESS_COND , A.METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.METAL_THICKNESS_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.TH_CENTER_COND , A.TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.TH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.TH_EDGE_COND , A.TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.TH_EDGE_ALWNCE_MINUS , ISNULL(A.GAP_OF_LAYER_COND, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_COND , ISNULL(A.GAP_OF_LAYER_PLUS, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_PLUS , ISNULL(A.GAP_OF_LAYER_MINUS, 0) AS GAP_OF_LAYER_MINUS , A.BURR_COND , A.BURR_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.BURR_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.WP_CENTER_COND , A.WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_COND , A.PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.PPF_DEPTH_CENTER_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.WP_DEVIATION_COND , A.WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.WP_DEVIATION_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.X1_X2_COND , A.X1_X2_COND_PLUS , A.X1_X2_COND_MINUS , A.TH_EDGE_RIGHT_COND , A.TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.TH_EDGE_RIGHT_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.BENDING_COND , A.BENDING_ALWNCE_PLUS , A.BENDING_ALWNCE_MINUS , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DATE , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DATE FROM TB_EQUIP_SIZE_COND_SIX_FLOOR_ADM A, TB_EQUIP_COND_COMMON_SIX_FLOOR_ADM B, TB_GOODS_CODE_ADM C WHERE 1=1 AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = B.EQUIP_COND_SEQ AND B.GOODS_CD = C.GOODS_CD AND A.EQUIP_COND_SEQ = #{equipCondSeq}
